specs.title: GET /pokemon/{id}/ - should return 404 for a non-existent pokemon ID
GET /pokemon/ - should retrieve all pokemon
POST /pokemon/ - should create a new pokemon
POST /pokemon/ - should return 404 for a non-existent team_id
POST /pokemon/ - should return 422 for missing required fields
DELETE /pokemon/{id}/ - should delete a pokemon by ID
DELETE /pokemon/{id}/ - should return 404 for a non-existent pokemon ID
PUT /pokemon/{id}/ - should update an existing pokemon
PUT /pokemon/{id}/ - should return 404 for a non-existent pokemon ID
PUT /pokemon/{id}/ - should return 404 for a non-existent team_id
PUT /pokemon/{id}/ - should return 422 for missing required fields
GET /teams/{id}/ - should retrieve a single team by ID
